actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to include, for purposes of determining entitlement to nonregular retired pay, participation in the Civilian Military Training Camp program.

summary.text: Includes for purposes of determinign entitlement to nonregular retired pay for members of the Armed Forces, participation in the Civilian Military Training Camp program. (Adds 10 U.S.C. 1332(a)(5))

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10 of the United States Code to include, for purposes of determining entitlement to nonregular retired pay, participation in the Civilian Military Training Camp program.
